channel.title: 508/562 Yell rainbow color? gradient and mixed colors in 1 letter?
channel.description: i am in a server where people can yell with a default color. If they type codes, their yell color changes such as the codes i show below yea i know <col=XXXXXX> <shad=XXXXXX><img=XX> BUT what is this code? theres one that seems to be a mixed rainbow color and one that is a gradient please reply i know it isnt a 317 server its a 508 server but other forums are too immature or not as large to contain this knowledge [img]http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/4767/mixedyell.jpg[/img]
